title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 February 2016 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius> has quit  
05:57 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:23 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:50 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
08:30 <cjd> has quit  
08:40 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <woshilapin> has quit  
09:14 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <vmassol> goodm orning  
09:18 <vmassol> \*morning  
09:18 <vmassol> I'm patching myxwiki.org to add cancelable events  
09:20 <vmassol> btw let's not forget to update http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/UpgradesLog when we modify the WAR  
09:20 <vmassol> (I had forgotten yesterday :) Just fixed it with hat I did)  
09:33 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:33 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <vmassol> I wonder if we should install the IRC bot on myxwiki.org (and have a separate channel for the notifications...  
09:39 <tmortagne> vmassol: for the whole myxwiki.org ?  
09:39 <vmassol> yes  
09:39 <vmassol> (the ircbot doesn't support only logging a given wiki, it has blacklists only AFAIR)  
09:40 <vmassol> actually  
09:40 <Enygma`> has quit  
09:40 <vmassol> I don't think we need that  
09:40 <tmortagne> either there is too much activity (as it should) or there will be so little activity that we'll drawn into despair :D  
09:40 <vmassol> but we do need to have the watchlist email working  
09:40 <vmassol> hehe  
09:41 <vmassol> starting spam cleanup on myxwiki.org  
09:42 <vmassol> btw tmortagne we caught 3 spammers yesterday on xwiki.org :)  
09:43 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AntiSpam/IPAddresses and http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AntiSpam/DisabledUsers  
09:43 <tmortagne> nice  
09:44 <tmortagne> playground, that's gentle spammers :)  
09:44 <vmassol> actually I think they keep using playground more because I still haven't implemented delayed indexing on it  
09:44 <tmortagne> I tough we could not register on playground  
09:44 <vmassol> we can  
09:44 <vmassol> (I fixed it)  
09:45 <vmassol> so today I need to update our saved DBs for delayed indexing  
09:45 <vmassol> (ie recreate it from playgroundtemplate)  
09:45 <tmortagne> the whole playground should not be indexed anyway I think  
09:45 <vmassol> indeed that'sa  good point  
09:46 <vmassol> doing it now  
09:47 <vmassol> done  
09:47 <vmassol> next time I recreate playground there'll be no indexing  
09:47 <vmassol> will do after myxwiki.org  
09:48 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <vmassol> making main wiki of myxwiki.org only editable/commentable by admins  
09:53 <vmassol> hmm  
09:54 <vmassol> tmortagne: if I don't give edit rights on the main wiki, since users are global, does it mean they won't have rights on the local wiki? Which mean each wiki owner would need to explicitly give edit rights on his wiki...  
09:54 <vmassol> correct?  
09:56 <tmortagne> vmassol: depends what on the template, I think local user are given edit right so whatever you do at main wiki leverl won't have much impact  
09:57 <vmassol> hmm indeed only the owner is global  
09:57 <vmassol> well it depends  
09:57 <tmortagne> you can have both  
09:57 <vmassol> how they've chosen to use their wiki  
09:57 <tmortagne> but what I mean is that most subwiki already have explicit edit right given  
09:57 <vmassol> so by removing edit rigths I could break stuff  
09:57 <tmortagne> so no ihneritance  
09:57 <vmassol> tmortagne: are we sure?  
09:58 <vmassol> we've had lots of varius templates over the year and admins could have modified them  
09:58 <vmassol> I'm pretty sure I'm going to break stuff if I do that  
09:58 <tmortagne> of course we cannot be sure, anyone can remove edit right on his wiki  
09:58 <vmassol> it's a pty we don't have rights for the main wiki  
09:58 <vmassol> (insted of farm)  
09:59 <vmassol> (ie separate farm rights from main wiki rights)  
09:59 <vmassol> for ex just checked massol.net  
09:59 <vmassol> and I don't have local rights for edit  
10:00 <vmassol> checking LCC  
10:01 <vmassol> myxwiki.org is quite slow  
10:01 <vmassol> for LCC it's ok because it's a closed wiki  
10:02 <vmassol> (we only allow local admins to do anything on it)  
10:02 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <cjd> vmassol: congratulations on busting some spammers  ^5 :)  
10:02 <vmassol> feels good :)  
10:03 <tmortagne> vmassol: you do have edit right set in your wiki  
10:03 <tmortagne> it's set to global XWikiAdminGroup  
10:03 <cjd> If this was finished 1 week before we might have sold to FreeBSD folks because they're having some ugly spam issues on their wiki  
10:04 <vmassol> haha, I'll blog/document it somewhere once it's finished  
10:04 <vmassol> something similar to https://www.dokuwiki.org/antispam?s[]=spam  
10:12 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning  
10:13 <vmassol> (wanted to ask something but found the answer)  
10:14 <mflorea> vmassol: good morning :)  
10:14 <vmassol> :)  
10:29 <vmassol> hmm can't delete this page: http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/main/ElsitiodSthefan45  
10:31 <tmortagne>   p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }  this page history seems broken  
10:31 <tmortagne> looks like it's not in a great shape at database level  
10:32 <tmortagne> maybe some translation without le original document or something like this  
10:33 <tmortagne> I resaved it and it looks better now but still can't delete it  
10:33 <tmortagne> vmassol: myxwiki.org is still multilingual  
10:33 <tmortagne> I tough to disabled it  
10:34 <vmassol> yes cleaning first  
10:34 <vmassol> since I need to be able to get all results ;)  
10:34 <gdelhumeau> I don't reproduce http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-flamingo-theme-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.flamingo.test.ui/FlamingoThemeTest/editFlamingoTheme/ locally  
10:34 <tmortagne> multilingual is just a UI thing, it does not have impact on scripts  
10:35 <vmassol> are you sure it doesn't affect search?  
10:36 <tmortagne> depends what you mean by search, it does not affect requests executed by some script for example  
10:36 <vmassol> btw tmortagne be careful not to resave a page with spam in the content :)  
10:36 <vmassol> (or you'll be a spammer)  
10:36 <tmortagne> but Solr search UI take it into account to filter result  
10:41 <tmortagne> (actually I think you can get other languages in Solr UI even with disabled multilangual, by selecting them on the right)  
10:42 <vmassol> i don't have the time to check all this right now so I'm deleting spam first and then I'll remove multilingual  
10:43 <vmassol> (taking the safe route)  
10:44 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <Slashman> has quit  
10:47 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <gdelhumeau> (I'm reproducing now)  
10:49 <cjd> Congratulations, dad  
10:49 <vmassol> :)  
11:02 <vmassol> tmortagne: this doesn't look right, could you check? http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/SpaceIndex?space=XWiki.Notifications.Code  
11:03 <tmortagne> vmassol: what am I supposed to check ?  
11:03 <tmortagne> looks like this document comes from an upgrade  
11:04 <tmortagne> not sure what is wrong about it  
11:15 <vmassol> ok so myxwiki.org's main wiki should be clean now  
11:15 <vmassol> removing multilingual  
11:15 <vmassol> tmortagne: the space is correct?  
11:16 <vmassol> hmm if i change multilingual is that going to affect subwikis in any way?  
11:16 <vmassol> I don't think so but asking to be sure  
11:16 <tmortagne> tmortagne: I do't know this extension so I can't tell you, I would have to look at the sources  
11:17 <tmortagne> at least in the XAR it's the only page in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-notifications/xwiki-platform-notifications-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/Notifications/Code  
11:18 <tmortagne> so unless we generate stuff it looks ok  
11:18 <vmassol> so we're using nested spaces already?  
11:18 <vmassol> (for new stuff I guess)  
11:18 <tmortagne> yes for new stuff  
11:18 <vmassol> btw http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Dashboard has not been upgraded  
11:19 <tmortagne> since AWM generate nested spaces we will see more new stuff with it  
11:19 <vmassol> actually it's an old page gong to remove it  
11:28 <johndoe1> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <johndoe1> Hi  
11:29 <cjd> howdy  
11:30 <cjd> your IP addr got blocked on XWiki.org ?  
11:30 <johndoe1> Not that i remember . Need help with a issue.  
11:31 <johndoe1> will it be a right place to ask  
11:31 <vmassol> sure John!  
11:32 <johndoe1> I am using solr 5 as external solr instead of embedded one with xwiki  
11:32 <johndoe1> frequently getting bombarded with this error  
11:32 <johndoe1> ror adding field 'propertyvalue\_\_'='annotationClass' msg=For input string: "annotationClass"  
11:32 <johndoe1> solr\_1      | at org.apache.solr.update.AddUpdateCommand.getLuceneDocument(AddUpdateCommand.java:83)  
11:32 <johndoe1> solr\_1      | at org.apache.solr.update.DirectUpdateHandler2.addDoc(DirectUpdateHandler2.java:163)  
11:33 <johndoe1> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <cjd> paste the error to https://ncry.pt/ and then put the link here  
11:34 <cjd> IRC doesn't allow pasting  
11:34 <vmassol> mflorea: would be nice to be able to click on the error box and get the stack trace: http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/main/ElsitiodSthefan45?xpage=delete&jobId=refactoring/delete/1454409235255-672  
11:35 <vmassol> mflorea: should I create a jira?  
11:35 <johndoe1> ahh thanks here is it https://ncry.pt/p/y4Bn#mM7IDAtRzKpS8-3ya7kSGFsYeJr\_FHY7zA-eh9\_ANSo  
11:40 <vmassol> tmortagne: you forgot to add <mapping resource="mailsender.hbm.xml"/> on myxwiki.org (or whoever upgraded it last). It was also fogotten on xwiki.org but I fixed it yesterdy night. Fixing myxwiki.org and restarting it  
11:48 <vmassol> hmm lots of these in the myxwiki.org logs:  
11:48 <vmassol> 2016-02-02 11:45:38,714 [http://odo.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome] INFO  o.x.v.i.DefaultVelocityEngine  - Runtime : ran out of parsers. Creating a new one.  Please increment the parser.pool.size property. The current value is too small.  
11:56 <vmassol> mflorea: created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13052  
11:57 <mflorea> vmassol: there is the job log just below  
11:58 <mflorea> wait  
11:58 <mflorea> that's for delete  
11:58 <mflorea> you should ping gdelhumeau then :P  
11:58 <vmassol> hehe ok :)  
11:59 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I've created XWIKI-13052 for you when you have some time :)  
11:59 <gdelhumeau> ok  
11:59 <mflorea> I thought it was for rename/copy, where you have the job log if you are an advanced user  
11:59 <mflorea> which should provide detailed info about the failure  
12:00 <mflorea> vmassol: the error should not be lost, it should be in the delete job log which is saved in the permanent directory  
12:01 <mflorea> we just need to show it  
12:01 <vmassol> ok  
12:01 <vmassol> checking the job logs  
12:02 <mflorea> look for refactoring/delete/sometimestamp  
12:06 <vmassol> thanks mflorea, found it: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/vmassol/95614fc9892f9695f01a/raw/b0834d78c8aae171b0e53d874a48c4a4e982fb15/gistfile1.txt  
12:06 <vmassol> BTW the messsage is wrong  
12:06 <vmassol> gdelhumeau:  
12:06 <vmassol> <detailMessage>Exception while deleting document {0}</detailMessage>  
12:07 <vmassol> missing the doc name  
12:07 <vmassol> reporting in the issue  
12:07 <mflorea> NPE, looks like a bug  
12:07 <mflorea> wait  
12:07 <mflorea> vmassol  
12:08 <mflorea> the parameter is elsewhere  
12:08 <tmortagne> mflorea: this is the throwable no the log  
12:08 <mflorea> ah  
12:08 <mflorea> right  
12:08 <tmortagne> (but I almost wrote the same thing as you :D)  
12:09 <mflorea> :)  
12:10 <vmassol> tmortagne: I'll report a jira for this failure to delete a doc  
12:11 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13053  
12:20 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: the failing test about flamingo theme editor should be solved now  
12:21 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: ok cool  
12:22 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: thanks for https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13052 but the doc link seems wrong  
12:22 <vmassol> points to http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki80M1#HColorThemeDisplayer  
12:23 <gdelhumeau> thnx you vmassol, I knew I had done something wrong with the jira issues, but I didn't find which one  
12:23 <gdelhumeau> corrected!  
12:29 <vmassol> going to restart myxwiki.org again with migrations on (that was also forgotten during the last upgrade). It's needed for the new mailsender module. Will need to do that on xwiki.org too after  
12:29 <vmassol> thanks gdelhumeau  
12:30 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: the issue is closed but I see no commit in the commt tab, normal?  
12:30 <gdelhumeau> oh I even closed it...  
12:31 <gdelhumeau> does not mean I don't want to work on it ;)  
12:31 <gdelhumeau> I wanted to close XWIKI-13051 initially and I picked the wrong tab in firefox  
12:32 <gdelhumeau> then when I went back to XWIKI-13051 I was wondering why it wasn't closed O\_o'  
12:38 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: it happens )  
12:38 <vmassol> :)  
12:41 <vmassol> cool first time I see the progress bar working when starting xwiki :)  
12:41 <vmassol> (since it takes a long time to upgrade all the dbs on myxwiki.org)  
13:00 <vmassol> FTR watchlist is working fine on myxwiki.org  
13:22 <finstern\_xwiki> has joined #xwiki  
13:22 <finstern\_xwiki> bonjour à vous  
13:23 <finstern\_xwiki> désolé de déranger, j'essaye de trouver comment corriger un soucis de dates sur mon projet xwiki  
13:23 <finstern\_xwiki> je me retrouve avec des dates de "dernière modification" du style : 28/29/2015  
13:24 <finstern\_xwiki> 07/49/2015  22/58/2015 etc  
13:25 <finstern\_xwiki> une idée d'où cela pourrait venir ?

14:26 <vmassol> found a regression in 7.4.x (works in 7.1.1 but not in 7.4 nor 8.0-SNAPSHOT), creating jira  
14:29 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13055  
15:05 <msmeria> has quit  
15:14 <Enygma`> has quit  
15:16 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
15:19 <vmassol> guys we've missed the 8.0M1 release :§  
15:19 <vmassol> :(  
15:19 <vmassol> next RM is Thomas or Marius  
15:19 <vmassol> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/  
15:20 <vmassol> we're one week behind!ç  
15:20 <tmortagne> vmassol: I'm already on 7.4.1  
15:20 <vmassol> we have a problem of when to identify the next RM for a given release  
15:21 <tmortagne> IMO it's not a big issue, I started working as RM of 7.4.1 so I'm 7.4.1 RM even if 7.4.1 is released after 8.0M1 after all (but given the state of jenkins for master I'm not sure 8.0M1 will be first)  
15:22 <tmortagne> it's not like 7.4.1 was delayed of 1 month  
15:27 <vmassol> it is a big issue to delay 8.0M1 by more than 1 week  
15:40 <tmortagne> I meant it's not a big issue if I release 7.4.1 after 8.0M1 even if I'm the first in the RM list  
15:42 <vmassol> cjd: was that you? https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13056  
15:42 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: yes sure http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/DataModel :)  
15:42 <vmassol> "llows to create a pseudo field for which the display can be configured using a custom displayer and the value retrieved by using a script. It allows to combine other fields together."  
15:42 <vmassol> .....  
15:43 <gdelhumeau> yes but what are the variable that we can use  
15:43 <vmassol> I know, was just mentioning that the doc is crapy  
15:43 <gdelhumeau> for example, in custom displayer, you have $value  
15:43 <gdelhumeau> ok  
15:43 <gdelhumeau> so we agree :)  
15:43 <vmassol> yep  
15:51 <finstern\_xwiki> excuse me  
15:52 <finstern\_xwiki> I had a question but had to restart the computer and I wondered if anybody had answered, it's about the strange date shown for the last edition of any doc  
15:52 <gdelhumeau>  found XWIKI-13057  
15:52 <finstern\_xwiki> I get stranges results such as 20/50/2015  
15:53 <gdelhumeau> 2015 was a big leap year maybe :p  
15:53 <finstern\_xwiki> lol  
15:54 <finstern\_xwiki> 2016 too then : 25/13/2016  
15:56 <finstern\_xwiki> any idea about where this bug could come from ?  
16:01 <gdelhumeau> I don't know, maybe an issue with the db  
16:04 <finstern\_xwiki> with the db, ok I will have to check it  
16:04 <finstern\_xwiki> where the editions and creations of pages date come from ?

16:13 <cjd> vmassol: nope  
16:13 <vmassol> k  
16:18 <gdelhumeau> finstern\_xwiki: it is stored in the xwikidoc table

16:42 <vmassol> fixing

17:04 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki

17:23 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
17:36 <finstern\_xwiki> can I get any help on UrlRewriteFilter please ?  
17:37 <vmassol> finstern\_xwiki: sure but you need to ask a question first :)  
17:42 <woshilapin> has quit  
17:45 <finstern\_xwiki> aha ok :D  
17:45 <finstern\_xwiki> so the question  
17:45 <finstern\_xwiki> I have my app in a sub wiki, so my current url is something like that :  
17:45 <finstern\_xwiki> http://xx.xx.xx.xx/xwiki/wiki/kb2  
17:46 <finstern\_xwiki> now, if I wanted to have http://xx.xx.xx.xx/kb2, how would that work with urlrewritefilter ?  
17:49 <vmassol> you need to write a rule that leads to the first url  
17:50 <vmassol> a rule that transforms the second url into the first one  
17:50 <vmassol> you can check the doc here: http://tuckey.org/urlrewrite/  
17:50 <vmassol> it has examples too  
17:51 <vmassol> more specifically here: http://cdn.rawgit.com/paultuckey/urlrewritefilter/master/src/doc/manual/4.0/index.html#configuration  
17:51 <vmassol> (you have some example here too: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ShortURLs#HUrlRewriteFilter )  
17:51 <finstern\_xwiki> aha ok !  
17:52 <finstern\_xwiki> I will check all those data, thank you Vincent  
17:54 <vmassol> yw  
17:55 <finstern\_xwiki> about the "shorurl" page  
17:56 <finstern\_xwiki> it's presented as a procedure not as an example, you may write that it's an example, not something working out of the box for all cases maybe  
17:57 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:57 <vmassol> I don't understand  
17:57 <vmassol> just read that page fully  
17:57 <finstern\_xwiki> when I read "install steps" it was a bit missleading and believed that was what have to be done for the urlrewrite to work  
17:57 <vmassol> if that's not what you need then you shouldn't follwo it :)  
17:58 <vmassol> finstern\_xwiki: you need to read the whole page  
17:58 <vmassol> especially the first 2 lines  
18:02 <finstern\_xwiki> ah well I was looking for a short url too :D  
18:03 <vmassol> this tutorial is not any short url  
18:03 <vmassol> it's to remove the xwiki/bin/view part  
18:03 <finstern\_xwiki> ok so that's just specific to the bin view part .. ok  
18:05 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
18:06 <vmassol> you can adapt it to your need
